content: [Naas quotes from interview] precipitating contacts and articulations: dogmatism, confusion, opportunism [see POS p. 62]
what/who (what concept/what real individual, singular entity)
hope, fear, trembling, when a name might mask the absence of a face [re: “subject” of Europe”]
replace “I” w/ “we” > move from feeling to axiom
culture of other: signals culture never has a single origin
what is proper to a culture is not to be identical to itself, culture of oneself as culture of other, gathered and divided at the heart, home: [violent syntax] différence (d’) avec soi
monogenealogy: mystification in history of culture
is Europe an example or exemplary?
“cap” (caput, capitis), the head, extremity of the extreme, last legs, final moment (eschaton > telos); captain (not a woman); eschatology and teleology—that is man
we must not forget programs that do not forget us [re: Eurocentrism, anti-Eurocentrism]
heading of the other: first condition of an identity that is not an egocentrism destructive of oneself and the other, not even anti-heading or decapitation
responsibility for the other heading—European?

every history, history of a culture, has a telos (promise, memory) toward which it dreams of gathering itself > anticipation & telos; and every history cannot be identified in advance, unanticipatable, non-masterable, that of which one has no memory
keep the heading (garder le cap) > because absolutely new might bring ghost of the worst

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: tout autre as virginal, completely new
must be suspicious of repetitive memory and tout autre of absolutely new [cf. POOF p. 65], of anamnestic capitalization & amnesic exposure to what would no longer be identifiable
guardians of Europe: white, civilized man

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end
advanced point is at once beginning and end, divided as beginning and end (Heidegger on Ort as point of spear, and fromm, Frömmigkeit, from promos, what leads, l’avant-garde)
Europe gathers difference into itself, is difference w/ itself
horizon (in ancient Greek) = the limit; to see itself [Europe] on the horizon, is to see itself from its end, discourse of anamnesis—taste for finality (goût de fin), for death

in the dated nature of dating, of currentness, lies a disquieting wrinkle, stigmata of anachrony marking all our days > traditional discourse of modernity, discourse of anamnesis w/ its goût de fin, if not for death
identification is always cultural never natural, always has a capital form, advanced point, capitalizing reserve
we did not choose this responsibility of our heritage [it is from the other, the language of our language], nor the capitalizing memory we have of it
double bind, injunction divides us > guardians of a European idea that cares for what is other than it, the other heading, the heading of the other
Europe: paleonymic appellation
Europe: paleonymic appellation
call to betray a certain order of capital is taking place now, in an act of memory faithful to the other heading
there is a crisis whenever the capital of infinity and universality finds itself in danger, when the eidos, limits, ends, confines, the finitude of Europe, emerges

crisis is not appropriate word any more for event of other heading: crisis [krinein, moment of decision] has always inspired a Selbstbesinnung (self-contemplation), a regaining of “direction (sens)” > protestant, capital discourse
Husserl’s “crisis of European sciences” sought recovery of transcendental theme in Descartes
capital as cutting edge of progress (à la pointe du progrès), universalizing model, everyone joins at the head
Heidegger’s Entmachtung of spirit > destitution of Europe
all names designate a negative limit & a chance
Derrida comes from other heading of Algeria
responsibility: making a chance of the memory of a name, of the idiomatic limit > an opening of identity to its future
“capillarities” (new media, techno-scientific powers): centralizing pulsions don’t always go through states anymore
double injunction of Europe: 1) cannot be dispersed (monopoly) 2) remote control [TV] (dispersion)
question of capital, question of hegemonic centrality
new topology re: capital, no longer linked to polis, “quasi-political”
only possible invention—impossible one
when a certain knowledge opens up path in advance—decision is already made > irresponsibly, w/ good conscience, one applies the program
only possible invention—impossible one
ethics, politics, responsibility only begin in aporia of double injunction

anti-democratic to shut off telephone, telephone blurs lines between public and private, the prefiguration and imperious prescription of the ruin of totalitarianism; the telephone inaugurates the formation of public opinion [and soon the videophone]
alliance of capital and a-capital (the other of capital): this seems impossible, it is, such is the nature of all responsibility

double bind of European cultural identity: 1) necessary not to reconstitute centralizing hegemony (the capital) 2) necessary not to cultivate minority differences for their sake, untranslatable idiolects (not to multiply borders, marges, marches)
following program—application of know-how > ethics & politics become a technology, no longer order of practical reason or decision, begins to be irresponsible

nationalism always a philosopheme, justifies itself in name of a privilege in the memory of the universal, of the transcendental, of the ontological > no one is more universal than the one that is we; cosmopolitanism & nationalism have always gotten on together

Europe advances itself as heading for universal essence of man > to advance oneself: to name oneself, rush out ahead, in front, anticipate, launch, stick one’s neck out, to love or to violate, to love to violate, to colonize, colonize itself
advance oneself (name & also extend), risk, Europe as avant-garde of geography & history
Paris invented “freedom of thought,” no matter what the English say

[summary of political responsibility today] denounce divergences btwn principle and the determined limits of their representation > task always urgent, infinite > always unequal to task of international rights (responsible for the universe)
word “avant-garde” [see pp. 25, 48-50]: capitalizes on figurehead, phallic point, advanced initiative of guarding, anticipating to conserve, thus “avant-garde position”

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: demand for “transparency,” “consensus,” common sense, intelligibility in new university space via publishing enterprises [new order, dogma]
have courage for a new critique of capital that avoids Marxist intimidation
word “capital,” like “cap,” like “culture,” like “colo,” in “colony” and “colonization,” like “civilization,” is Latin word
liber (era, eri, bri): 1) free, emancipated, unbridled 2) name of Bacchus, wine 3) inner bark of tree used for writing, treatise
affirmation (faith) in language defies all metalanguage
Valéry: Mediterranean has been a veritable machine for making culture
via Valéry, most interesting moment of rhetorical capitalization of “capital” (its hierarchization): regional capital always calls for always threatened universal capital
Valéry: “our body”—best known capital, gives capital its most literal/proper meaning
[threatened] ideality in capitalization: that which exceeds borders of sensible, opens onto infinite, gives rise to universal, “maxim of maximization,” nothing other than spirit itself (analogic)
Derrida will subscribe to European analogic (ideality, capitalization) w/ one hand, write outside it w/ the other
via Valéry, people who read are responsible for, respond before, turn memory into “solid value,” create an absolute surplus value, increase of universal capital, “world’s wealth” increases

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: Derrida precipitates conclusion, which is movement of the head (chef)
value of universality capitalizes all antinomies, linked to value of exemplarity which inscribes universality in proper body of singularity (idiom or culture)
any decision that does not endure antimony is a dangerous mystification, immorality plus good conscience, good conscience as immorality

whether hospitable or xenophobic, self-affirmation of identity always claims to be responding to call of universality, an inscription of universal in singular, unique testimony to human essence and to what’s proper to man
for Husserl, the European philosopher committed to universal reason is functionary of mankind

this same duty dictates welcoming foreigners, cultivating virtue of critical idea, but also submitting critique to deconstructive genealogy that exceeds it w/out compromising it, dictates a democracy to come (not even a regulative Kantian idea), tolerance of faith, minorities
duty to act in accord w/ a double contradiction that is not simply a Kantian illusionary antimony but an effective one (w/ experience, through experiment), interminable
the duty to respond to call of European memory, all other duties presuppose this one in silence [?]
integrate immigrant, recognize and accept alterity of immigrant: 2 concepts of hospitality
democracy to-come not a Kantian regulative idea, not a certain future, but a democracy that has structure of promise > memory of that which carries the to-come here and now

double constraint, performative contradiction, undecidable (typical, recurring form & inexhaustible singularization) > conditions for duty can only take negative form, once you hear “these are the conditions,” you are being deluded

every time Europe, politics, responsibility, decision is reduced to what they must exceed (order of the present, of presentation [knowledge, certainty, judgment in the form “this is that”]), we have the very presentable face of good conscience
paleonyms: “identity,” “culture,” “Europe,” “capital” > take them very seriously, cautiously, lightly, only in quotation marks
if public opinion wasn’t ephemeral, if it could take place, it would enable transparent discussion
public opinion > ubiquity of a specter
newspaper facilitates recognition of public opinion
everydayness as a category of social rhythm is not natural (that is, universal)
paradigmatic moment of public opinion’s inside/outside relation to parliamentary democracy: Petition of Grievances (Cahiers de Doléances)
language (mark) threatens rigor of public/private distinction
doesn’t a democrat have the responsibility to analyze unrelentingly democracy's historical determinations?
“public” space & Aufklärung, Kant
speak seriously of the press in the press? only in contraband
“new censorship” combines concentration & fractionalization, accumulation & privatization > de-politicizes every informing of a “fact,” no information escapes
the way “cultural press” dogmatizes, culture determined by whoever monopolizes decision to bring to daylight; quasi-private, “difficult,” “obscure” works excluded from the scene
that which is not mass-produced is unreadable
samizdat: Russian for self-edition, the means of distributing work prohibited by censorship
Kafka, Joyce, Proust, Nietzsche were saved by a handful of readers—but what readers! [re: possible oversight of great media machines of today]
press brings light of day to its publicity, (se) donner…(pour) le jour, gives daylight to day itself > right of response hardly exists
one day the day today (visibility of image, publicity of public) will not be the ratio essendi of the political
for Valéry, capital belongs to series of Europe’s phenomenal manifestations
vis-à-vis Valéry, what has not yet happened in history: the capital event of a concept, which would be to think the event as such > the capital event is also the event of capital, the head
Valéry predicts media war & says everything fiduciary requires conventions (relays, intermediary) that destroys rudimentary life
privilege is by definition a delicateness in danger > danger comes from foreigner
from Valéry, Europe name of that which leads subject to desiring maximum (capital, power)
Valéry: freedom is always a response
Valéry: capital would consume Frenchmen w/ “concentration camp” of jealousy
spirit as exemplary example, example par excellence, of value (source of value)
Valéry makes analogy btwn spirit, value & capital [refers to Nietzsche]
Valéry: the word “spirit” > first commerce of the world [logocentrism]
for Valéry, logos: calculation, reason, speech, discourse, knowledge > history
via Valéry, originary & transcategorical character of spirit, original spiritualism a logocentrism born in Mediterranean
